text:
Customer: Where is my order?
Support: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email.

Customer: How do I return a product?
Support: You can return the product within 30 days using our return portal.

Customer: What is your return policy?
Support: Refunds are processed within 5â€“6 business days after receiving the item.

Customer: Can I cancel my order?
Support: Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placing them.

Customer: Do you offer international shipping?
Support: We offer international shipping in selected countries.

Customer: How long does delivery take?
Support: Delivery usually takes 3 to 5 business days.

Customer: My order is delayed.
Support: We apologize for the delay. Please check your tracking details for updates.

Customer: Can I change my delivery address?
Support: Address changes are allowed before the order is shipped.

Customer: My order shows delivered but I did not receive it.
Support: Please contact our support team so we can investigate this issue.

Customer: I received a damaged product.
Support: Please request a replacement from your order details page.

Customer: I received the wrong item.
Support: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please initiate a replacement request.

Customer: What payment methods do you accept?
Support: We accept credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and net banking.

Customer: My payment failed but money was deducted.
Support: The deducted amount will be refunded within 3 to 5 business days.

Customer: Is cash on delivery available?
Support: Cash on delivery is available for selected locations.

Customer: How do I apply a coupon code?
Support: You can apply the coupon code during checkout.

Customer: My coupon code is not working.
Support: Please check the coupon validity and applicable terms.

Customer: Do you offer discounts?
Support: We offer seasonal discounts and promotional offers.

Customer: How do I reset my password?
Support: Click on the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page.

Customer: I forgot my account password.
Support: Please use the password recovery option to reset it.

Customer: Can I delete my account?
Support: You can request account deletion by contacting customer support.

Customer: Is my personal data secure?
Support: Yes, we use secure systems to protect customer data.

Customer: Do you store my payment information?
Support: No, we do not store your payment details.

Customer: Can I place a bulk order?
Support: Please contact our sales team for bulk order inquiries.

Customer: Do you provide gift wrapping?
Support: Gift wrapping is available for selected products.

Customer: Can I add a gift message?
Support: Yes, you can add a gift message during checkout.

Customer: My order is stuck in processing.
Support: Orders are usually processed within 24 hours.

Customer: Why is my order pending?
Support: Orders may be pending due to payment verification.

Customer: Can I reorder a previous purchase?
Support: Yes, you can reorder items from your order history.

Customer: What if I miss my delivery?
Support: The courier will attempt delivery again.

Customer: Do you deliver on weekends?
Support: Weekend delivery depends on courier availability.

Customer: How do I update my profile details?
Support: You can update your profile from account settings.

Customer: Can I change my registered email address?
Support: Email updates can be done from account settings.

Customer: How can I contact customer support?
Support: You can contact us via chat, email, or phone support.

Customer: What are your support hours?
Support: Our support team is available 24/7.

Customer: Can I speak to a human agent?
Support: Yes, you can request a human agent during support hours.

Customer: Will I receive an invoice?
Support: Yes, invoices are available in the order details section.

Customer: Can I download my invoice?
Support: You can download invoices from your order history.

Customer: What happens if my refund is delayed?
Support: Please contact support if your refund exceeds the expected timeline.

Customer: Will I get a refund for cancelled orders?
Support: Yes, refunds are issued automatically for cancelled orders.

Customer: How do I check my refund status?
Support: You can check refund status from the order details page.

Customer: Can I change the payment method after placing an order?
Support: Payment method cannot be changed once the order is placed.

Customer: My order was auto-cancelled.
Support: Orders may be auto-cancelled if payment verification fails.

Customer: Why was my order cancelled?
Support: Orders are cancelled due to payment failure or stock unavailability.

Customer: Is there a delivery charge for express shipping?
Support: Express shipping charges vary based on location and will be shown at checkout.

Customer: Can I select a delivery time slot?
Support: Delivery time slots are available in selected locations.

Customer: I want to change the product size.
Support: Product changes are allowed before shipment.

Customer: Can I exchange a product?
Support: Exchanges are available for eligible products within 30 days.

Customer: How do I request an exchange?
Support: You can request an exchange from your order details page.

Customer: Is there a pickup service for returns?
Support: Yes, return pickup is available in most locations.

Customer: My return pickup failed.
Support: Please reschedule the pickup from your order page.

Customer: Do you offer same-day delivery?
Support: Same-day delivery is available in selected cities.

Customer: Can I track my return status?
Support: Return status can be tracked from your order history.

Customer: What happens after return pickup?
Support: Once received, the item will be inspected before refund processing.

Customer: Will I get store credit instead of refund?
Support: You can choose store credit if available during return request.

Customer: Can refunds be issued to a different account?
Support: Refunds are issued only to the original payment method.

Customer: My refund amount is incorrect.
Support: Please contact support so we can verify the refund details.

Customer: Do you notify before delivery?
Support: Yes, you will receive delivery notifications via SMS or email.

Customer: I want to update my phone number.
Support: Phone number can be updated from account settings.

Customer: Can I pause my delivery?
Support: Delivery pause option depends on courier availability.

Customer: My package is out for delivery but not delivered.
Support: Please wait till end of day or contact support if issue continues.

Customer: What if the item is out of stock after ordering?
Support: You will be notified and refunded if an item is unavailable.

Customer: Do you restock sold-out items?
Support: Popular items are restocked based on availability.

Customer: How do I subscribe for restock alerts?
Support: You can enable restock alerts on the product page.

Customer: Is there a warranty on products?
Support: Warranty availability depends on the product category.

Customer: How do I claim warranty?
Support: Warranty claims can be initiated through customer support.

Customer: Can I merge two orders?
Support: Orders cannot be merged once placed.

Customer: Can I split my order?
Support: Order splitting is not supported currently.

Customer: Why did I receive multiple packages?
Support: Items may be shipped separately for faster delivery.

Customer: Do you ship from multiple warehouses?
Support: Yes, orders may be fulfilled from different warehouses.

Customer: How do I report a missing item?
Support: Please contact support with your order details.

Customer: My delivery location is not serviceable.
Support: We apologize, delivery availability depends on courier coverage.

Customer: Do you support green packaging?
Support: We use eco-friendly packaging where possible.

Customer: Can I leave delivery instructions?
Support: You can add delivery instructions during checkout.

Customer: I want to rate my delivery experience.
Support: You can rate your experience after order completion.

Customer: How do I give product feedback?
Support: Product reviews can be submitted from order history.

Customer: Can I reorder a cancelled order?
Support: Cancelled orders can be reordered from order history.

Customer: Do you provide installation services?
Support: Installation services are available for selected products.

Customer: How do I book installation?
Support: Installation can be booked during checkout or later from orders.

Customer: What if installation is delayed?
Support: Please contact support if installation is delayed.

Customer: Are accessories included with the product?
Support: Included accessories are mentioned on the product page.

Customer: Can I request contactless delivery?
Support: Contactless delivery is available in supported locations.

Customer: Do you verify products before shipping?
Support: Yes, products undergo quality checks before shipment.

Customer: Can I add items to my order after placing it?
Support: Items cannot be added once the order is placed.

Customer: My order status is not updating.
Support: Status updates may take some time to reflect.

Customer: What if my package is lost?
Support: Please contact support and we will investigate immediately.

Customer: How do I escalate an issue?
Support: You can request escalation by contacting customer support.

Customer: Do you have a loyalty program?
Support: Yes, loyalty rewards are available for eligible customers.

Customer: How do loyalty points work?
Support: Loyalty points are earned on purchases and can be redeemed later.

Customer: Can loyalty points expire?
Support: Loyalty points may expire as per program terms.

Customer: How do I check my loyalty balance?
Support: Loyalty balance is visible in your account section.

Customer: Can I use multiple coupons?
Support: Only one coupon can be applied per order.

Customer: Do coupons expire?
Support: Coupon expiry details are mentioned in the offer terms.

Customer: Why was my coupon removed?
Support: Coupons may be removed if order conditions change.

Customer: Is GST included in prices?
Support: GST details are included in the invoice.

Customer: Can I get a GST invoice?
Support: GST invoices can be downloaded from order history.

Customer: Can I place an order without an account?
Support: Guest checkout is available for selected users.

Customer: How do I convert guest order to account order?
Support: You can link your order after account creation.

Customer: Can I save multiple addresses?
Support: Yes, multiple addresses can be saved in your account.

Customer: Which address will be used for refund pickup?
Support: Refund pickup uses the delivery address by default.

Customer: How do I report suspicious activity?
Support: Please contact support immediately for security concerns.

Customer: Do you record customer calls?
Support: Calls may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

Customer: Can I opt out of promotional emails?
Support: You can manage communication preferences in account settings.

Customer: How do I unsubscribe from notifications?
Support: Notification preferences can be updated in settings.

Customer: Do you support accessibility features?
Support: We are working to improve accessibility across platforms.

Customer: How do I close a support ticket?
Support: Tickets are closed automatically once the issue is resolved.
